Client.Name: Nanjing Kaiben Language Training Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Kaiben Education is an educational team in East China specializing in overseas study preparation and exam training (including IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, GMAT, SAT, and ACT). 

  Our faculty comprises elite returnees from prestigious global institutions such as Nanyang Technological University (Singapore), University of Liverpool (UK), University of Manchester (UK), and Western Sydney University. Additionally, we gather numerous instructors with over six years of specialized training and examination research experience in TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, ACT, GRE, and GMAT.

  Kaiben Education upholds a student-centered philosophy, leveraging its specialized test preparation team to champion a refined, elite, and meticulous educational approach. We are committed to providing high-quality exam coaching and professional training for international students, serving as your go-to solution for study abroad exams.
